txt.en: Quests for the Haban'akkâ can be accepted from Thorin or King Thráin at Amdân.\n\nHermáth Stormhammer has suggested that you aid the Haban'akkâ and continue your studies of the Sixth War of the Dwarves and Orcs.
'So much had transpired in so short a time, but the Dwarves of the Haban'akkâ would not bow to Azog or any other Orc!'
In the course of a single day, the fates of the Orcs and the Dwarves of Middle-earth would be forever changed.

'At the dawn of the Battle of Azanulbizar, the Dwarves of the Haban'akkâ arrayed themselves throughout the dale as the Kings of the Seven Houses had commanded. Among the Haban'akkâ, brave dwarves of every sort fought to ensure victory over Azog and his vile kin and at last win an end to the Sixth War of the Dwarves and Orcs.\n\n'If you wish to continue your studies, there is yet more to be learned.'
Complete any <rgb=#00FF00>4</rgb> of the following quests for the Haban'akkâ of Thráin:
Hermáth Stormhammer can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou have continued your studies of the Battle of Azanulbizar. You should return to Hermáth Stormhammer.
